name: Vecer Axe [1]
description: The axe in mass production. Made by Blacksmith Guild, it is the counterfeit of the famous Vecer Battle Axe.

name: Vecer Axe [2]
description: The axe in mass production. Made by Blacksmith Guild, it is the counterfeit of the famous Vecer Battle Axe.

name: Vecer Battle Axe [1]
description: The axe is all decorated in red and looks very superb. It is said that a unique sound will be created when you weave it.

name: Vecer Battle Axe [2]
description: The axe is all decorated in red and looks very superb. It is said that a unique sound will be created when you weave it.

name: Venice Summer
description: [Venice Summer]: the latest work of Vettel Moura, the 14th president of House Moura, the most famous perfume family of the land. Ms. Matier Moura always wears heavy and luxurious dress to stay elegant even in hot summer.

name: Venom Dagger [1]
description: A sharp dagger made from the purple poison of some poisonous bird's venom.
effect: Str ＋5,Poison state cannot be cured by Panacea

name: Venom Dagger [2]
description: A sharp dagger made from the purple poison of some poisonous bird's venom.
effect: Str ＋5,Poison state cannot be cured by Panacea

name: Veteran Axe [1]
description: The Archaean blacksmith used the metal given by God to make an axe. When a person who knows how to use the metal take this axe, it can bring indescribable Str.

name: Veteran Axe [2]
description: The Archaean blacksmith used the metal given by God to make an axe. When a person who knows how to use the metal take this axe, it can bring indescribable Str.

name: Vidar's Boots [1]
description: The boots worn by the son of Odin, Detale, when he killed Philip the wolf. They contain the strenuous vitality and mental strength he could bear.

name: Vidar's Boots [2]
description: The boots worn by the son of Odin, Detale, when he killed Philip the wolf. They contain the strenuous vitality and mental strength he could bear.

name: Vinkt's Bracelet
description: The words inside the bracelet are worn out, You can only recognize words "you shall not".
effect: Flee ＋10,When equipped by Swordsman/Thief/Priest/Merchant, it brings 1 point of Atk for every 10 points of Flee.

name: Vinkt's Bracelet [1]
description: The words inside the bracelet are worn out, You can only recognize words "you shall not".
effect: Flee ＋10,When equipped by Swordsman/Thief/Priest/Merchant, it brings 1 point of Atk for every 10 points of Flee.

name: Violet Dyestuffs
description: A magic potion to dye the hair purple.

name: Virgo Crown
description: Crown that symbolizes Virgo, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with sapphire.

name: Virgo Crown Blueprint
description: Crown that symbolizes Virgo, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with sapphire.

name: Virgo Diadem
description: Diadem that symbolizes Virgo, one of the twelve zodiacal signs. It's inlaid with sapphire.
